DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Surgery to rebuild the shape of the breast after a mastectomy._The pigmented protuberance on the surface of the breast through which milk is drawn from the breast._The process by which something is brought into existence._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.
